price: Kae εberε a Mose ka kyerεε n’abͻfra (Yusha’u anaasε Yosua) sε: “Mennyae (nanteε anaasε mennye m’ahome) kͻpem sε meduru ͻpo mmienu no abͻeε anaasε mεkͻ so ara mfeɛ mu “.
arabic: وَإِذۡ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِفَتَىٰهُ لَآ أَبۡرَحُ حَتَّىٰٓ أَبۡلُغَ مَجۡمَعَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَيۡنِ أَوۡ أَمۡضِيَ حُقُبٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qāla mūsā lifatāhu lā abraḥu ḥattā ablugha majmaʿa al-baḥrayni aw amḍiya ḥuquban
